fields.name: identifier
fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: An unambiguous reference to a resource within a given context.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to identify a resource by means of a string conforming to a formal identification system.

fields.name: occurrenceID
fields.title: Occurrence ID
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a persistent, globally unique identifier. In the absence of a persistent global unique identifier, construct one from a combination of identifiers in the record that will most closely make a dwc:occurrenceID globally unique.

fields.name: identifierType
fields.title: Identifier Type
fields.description: A category or system that best matches the nature of an Identifier.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: identifierTypeIRI
fields.title: Identifier Type IRI
fields.description: An IRI of a controlled vocabulary value for the type of Identifier.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use an IRI for a term in a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: identifierTypeVocabulary
fields.title: Identifier Type Vocabulary
fields.description: A reference to a controlled vocabulary in which the definition of a value in identifierType is given.

fields.name: identifierLanguage
fields.title: Identifier Language
fields.description: A language in which an Identifier is presented.
fields.comments: Recommended best prectice is to use an ISO639-2 three-letter language code.
